channel.title: When is the new runescape comming out?
channel.description: well like the title says, when is runescape2 gonna come out? does anyone know any info on this?

item.title: When is the new runescape comming out?
item.dc:creator: @mjordan mjordan
item.description:
@mjordan wrote:

R.I.P RSC:

Well, having high rep isnt special. But I agree with you that leechers at least should say thanks.

but you cant deny that you would like to have high ++. and yes that makes me mad when they just leech and run.

item.title: When is the new runescape comming out?
item.dc:creator: @Zach1188 Zach1188
item.description:
@Zach1188 wrote:

[quote=“mjordan, post:40, topic:37751”][quote author=Scar link=topic=53393.msg668340#msg668340 date=1166834467]
your sig is wrong , its Rep++ instead ++Rep
[/quote]
umm…no its not. my sig is right.[/quote]
It’s right either way (I assume it came from Java/C, where ++Var1 and Var1++ just add 1 to it). But, the forum says “Rep++”, not “++Rep”.

Edit:
I just noticed you changed it

item.title: When is the new runescape comming out?
item.dc:creator: @Zach1188 Zach1188
item.description:
@Zach1188 wrote:

[quote=“mjordan, post:23, topic:37751”][quote author=nathan173 link=topic=53393.msg660270#msg660270 date=1166712036]

m8 we know this stuuf mjordan ure a jr member with 0 rep even the senior membas fing ure rong rsc is ruenscape 1 cause it was the 1st 1 out and the one now is rs2 cause its the secong 1 out god!
[/quote]

ROFLMAO!!! you saying im a juniour member with zero rep???well check again there pedro. and all you people callin me a noob, ive been around waaaayyyy longer than 98% of you. and im more than you guys can ever dream of being.[/quote]

[quote=“mjordan, post:25, topic:37751”][quote author=Mopman link=topic=53393.msg661668#msg661668 date=1166737501]
Well, if length of time is all that matters, I’ve been around much longer than you. And you’re talking shit.
[/quote]

was i talking shit to you??? here ill answer that NO! and i know that you’ve been around longer than me, i remember when i first joined kaits you were already there. and no, length of time isnt all that matters i have 850 post. but postcount isnt shit either. i actually help people unlike most of these guys that posted. they just go around spamming and saying dumb shit.[/quote]
You’re better than all of us? Fuck off, you conceded prick. I’m sure the only reason you get rep is because of your sig. And you implied that post count even matters at all? Well, 800 posts actually isn’t too much to brag about.

RSC = RS1
RS = RS2
If you think otherwise, you are WRONG, PERIOD.

Read full topic

item.title: When is the new runescape comming out?
item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT
item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

They originally called it RS3D, then RS2, then they said “It’s Runescape. Runescape is now Runescape Classic”. Bullshit. Runescape is Runescape. Runescape3 is going to be a load of shit. I judge that by the fact that RS2 is crap compared to RSC. They tried to make it look good graphically and balance the wilderness, but instead they got rid of the distinctive style of the graphics and the PVP.

If they sold Runescape Classic in a boxed set that cost 20$, that gave you access to hosting your own RSC servers, that would make more sense than developing RS3.

Read full topic
item.source: When is the new runescape comming out?

lol ok i promise its like that go read about it in the wikepedia or whatever encyclopedia. its referred to as runescape classic and runescape. runescape 2 has not yet come out.

Its RS3 end of.Jagex used to call it rs2, is still is rs2.

Read full topic
